abstract: Dollar General Stores chief operating officer Todd Vasos will replace Rick Dreiling as chief executive of the discount retailer.
lead_paragraph: Discount retailer Dollar General Stores said Todd Vasos, its chief operating officer, would replace Rick Dreiling as chief executive, effective June 3.

headline.main: Dollar General Promotes a Top Executive to Chief
headline.print_headline: Dollar General Promotes a Top Executive to Chief

snippet: Discount retailer Dollar General Stores said Todd Vasos, its chief operating officer, would replace Rick Dreiling as chief executive, effective June 3.
